message.raw:
Improved plugin system

* Added reference to queue manager
* Fixed GUI when displaying multiple notifications
* Gave plugins the option of running the callbacks associated with showing/hiding/closing notifications when the notification was programatically hidden/shown/closed
* Fixed bug in connection_table plugin which prevented the filewatcher from being updated with new paths to watch until BLACS was restarted

  • Fixed bug in connection_table plugin which prevented the filewatcher from being updated with new paths to watch until BLACS was restarted

message:
Improved plugin system

* Added reference to queue manager
* Fixed GUI when displaying multiple notifications
* Gave plugins the option of running the callbacks associated with showing/hiding/closing notifications when the notification was programatically hidden/shown/closed
* Fixed bug in connection_table plugin which prevented the filewatcher from being updated with new paths to watch until BLACS was restarted
